response.overview: Shyam, a married teacher, gets romantically involved with his student Sandhya. However, they find themselves in the middle of a love triangle when Kamal, her classmate, tries to woo her
response.tagline: Edit Haraamkhor (transl. Scoundrel) is a 2017 Indian romantic drama film directed by Shlok Sharma.[3][4][5] It stars Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Shweta Tripathi.[
response.title: Scroundrel
